post.body: my bad, that's how I read it. to be honest, we need to reboot the entire country (but without a war).
kudos for podal power! i wish my office was closer, but I try to telecommute as much as I can. 20 ft vs. 35 miles. ;-)
Where you see irreconcilable differences, I see challenges and educational opportunities. BTW, please install WP_OpenID. ;-)
and you want to move CLOSER than 1.2 miles? Oy vey! I'm 35 (no decimals!) from my office. Sheesh! ;-)
(not saying that applied to you.) Ok. Sorry for the rant folks!
so often we Americans are more concerned about our own selfish feelings than what's right for the Country.
if it buys Obama some political capital early on to help truly be a "Uniter" and not a "Divider" then good for him.
we need to pick our battles. in all honesty, is rick warren really that worth it? he's not.
country. and why not do so? it can't hurt. those that are getting their panties in a bunch over him need to take a step back.
i don't care for rick warren, but i see his pick for what it is, and that's to appeal to the social conservatives in this
if we're not willing to associate with those who share different beliefs than us?
this includes not just surrounding ourselves among those we agree with. how else are we to understand our differences
not my 1st choice. here's the deal: we need to start being inclusive in this country.
in the grand scheme of things it's not that big of a deal, and I think it's an olive branch to the conservatives.
- and I think Bush, Cheney, Rumsfield, Gonzo, and Ashcroft should all be arrested. But, thanks for the add!
- you do realize that I'm a Republican's worst nightmare? A gay, educated, tree-hugging, upper middle class, socialist liberal?
the actor who played sokar was the same actor who played anubis
a truly justifiable reason for violating the DMCA and ripping your DVDs
sorry to hear that! things are getting back all around.
;-) I've had my eyes on several Subarus. Love them all! Like you, I ain't rich… yet, so I still drive the Mazda.
